Fit.rationale: Rationale: Strong product-led operator with proven experience scaling teams (90–140), launching ML-enabled consumer features (Realtor.com), building data science orgs (Financial Engines), and advising investors/boards (Silver Lake, SV Angels, Change Healthcare). Seniority and GTM strengths align to CEO/Co-founder requirements. Gaps: no record of personally leading/closing a seed or Series A round; limited explicit Generative AI (LLM) product commercialization evidence; mental-health-specific product experience is limited (healthcare advisory exists). Recommendation: Position as a product-first, investor-facing CEO/Co-founder who operationalizes POC→market. Emphasize Silver Lake investor diligence work, CEO recruiting/coaching, Move Inc ML product leadership, early-stage product launches at 33Across, and current Georgia Tech MSCS (AI) to bridge technical credibility. Be transparent on fundraising experience; propose co-founder structure or highlight investor relationships and fundraising readiness.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: 33Across (Series B) CPO role; Operating Executive at PE advising early-stage leaders.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - Highlight early-stage leadership & PM-led product founding work.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Resume/QA: supported CEO on fundraising but did not lead/close rounds.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Ask - Request explicit fundraising lead details before claiming.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Move Inc: ML-driven features (computer vision); Silver Lake: advised on AI strategy; Georgia Tech MSCS (AI) in progress.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - Mirror JD term 'Generative AI' and request project specifics.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: QA: Board Advisor at Change Healthcare (healthcare transformation) but no explicit mental-health roles.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Ask - Clarify mental-health specific projects to include (if any).

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Experience taking POC to market / product iteration (High)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: 33Across product launches; Move Inc ML features rolled to production; Silver Lake POC→scale advising.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - Emphasize POC→pilot→production examples and customer feedback loops.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Led 140-person (Move Inc), 90-person (Financial Engines); recruited/coached 10+ execs (Silver Lake).
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - Add remote/distributed team experience if applicable.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Move Inc monetization and growth; Financial Engines omnichannel marketing and conversion gains.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - Use JD GTM language (ICP, LTV/CAC, channels).

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Board Advisory at Change Healthcare (QA); Silver Lake portfolio oversight possibly included regulated companies.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Ask - Request details on regulatory/compliance involvement to cite.

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Investor / VC network in tech or mental health (Med)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Silver Lake Operating Executive role; Silicon Valley Angels membership (QA).
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Add (if true) - List key investors/advisors to demonstrate network.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Advisory work at Change Healthcare implies exposure; no explicit compliance bullets.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Ask - Probe for compliance oversight examples before claiming.

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Located / willing to travel to SF Bay Area (Low)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Based in Cupertino; prior roles in Menlo Park/Santa Clara.

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Experience with early-stage customers & iterative onboarding (Low)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: 33Across launches and Silver Lake portfolio onboarding/PMI work.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - Highlight customer onboarding feedback loops and pilot metrics.

Questions: Have you personally led or closed a seed or Series A round? If yes, list round (seed/Series A), amount, year, and your role (lead/co-founder/executive).
For your AI/ML work, please list specific technologies/models (e.g., computer vision, LLMs), your role (owner/partner), team size, and commercialization stage (POC/pilot/production) for each project.
Describe your Board Advisor role at Change Healthcare: dates, primary scope (strategy/product/compliance), and any measurable outcomes or deliverables.
What else should I know about you and this job?
